Text: Thank you for ordering Papa Johns pizza confirmation PST Your order from Papa Johns pizza will be ready for pickup in approximately minutes In the event that the restaurant has a question about your order or requires confirmation before your order is prepared we will attempt to contact you by telephone If we are unable to reach you by telephone you will receive an email notification from a Papa Johns customer service representative Your order total including tax is Thank you for choosing to order online with Papa Johns pizza If you have any questions or need immediate assistance regarding your order please contact us at to speak with a customer service representative and refer to Order

Welcome to Papa JohnsPST Hello Eric Bass Thank you for registering as a Papa Johns Pizza Consumer You will now be able to locate the Papa Johns in your neighborhood around your office or wherever you are and order a delicious Papa Johns pizza right from your computer Papa Johns is the most convenient way to enjoy pizza whether takeout or delivery service You can browse through our menu at your own pace and once youve placed an order you can place the same order next time with just one click when you return to wwwpapajohnscom If you ever have any questions please call us toll free at Again welcome to Papa Johns Online Ordering Service
